name: Yardian
0:
”Alexa, ask Yardian to start watering”
”Alexa, ask Yardian to start zone one for two minutes”
”Alexa, ask Yardian to stop watering”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yardian
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Yardian skill allows you to use voice command to control your Yardian with some basic and commonly used functions. To get started, you need to have a Yardian account available. You can create your Yardian account through Yardian App or Yardian Web App (https://webapp.yardian.com). Once you create your account and login to the Yardian App, you can create a yard Profile which includes all the information about your yard.

Please download Yardian skill from the Alexa App. You then need to login with your Yardian account and specify the Profile to be controlled by your voice commands.

For more information about the Yardian Skill, please visit https://support.aeonmatrix.com/hc/en-us/articles/360000396072-Yardian-and-Amazon-Alexa
